verses.verse: In the same way, you wives must submit to your own husbands, so that if any refuse to believe, they will be won over without a word by the conduct of their wives
while watching your pure conduct [and] respectful honor.
Do not let your beauty be in external things like the way you fix your hair, decorate yourself with gold, or clothes you put on
but in internal things of the heart, which can not perish, like a meek and quiet spirit, which is worth much in God's sight.
For in the past it was in this way that the holy women, who trusted in God, made themselves beautiful, being submitted to their own husbands.
For example, Sarah obeyed Abraham, calling him lord, whose daughters you are as long as you do well and are not afraid at every scary thing.

Likewise, you husbands live with [your wives] with an understanding attitude, giving honor to the wife since [she is] more delicate [than you] and [you are] heirs together of the grace of life, [do this] so that your prayers are not hindered.
Finally, be like minded, have compassion on one another, be loving as brothers, be tender hearted, be courteous.
Do not pay back evil for evil, or verbal abuse for verbal abuse, but instead a blessing, because you are called for this, so that you should inherit a blessing,
for he who desires to love life and see good days, must refrain his tongue from speaking evil and his lips from speaking deceit.
Let him stay away from evil and do good; let him seek peace and pursue it.
For the eyes of the Lord [are] on the righteous, and his ears [listen to] their prayers, but the Lord's face [is] against those who do evil.
Who will hurt you, if you become imitators of the good?
But even if you suffer doing what is right, then you are blessed. Do not be afraid or troubled by their terror.
Instead, deeply revere the Lord God in your hearts. Always be ready to answer with gentleness and respectfulness anyone who asks you about the reason for the hope that is in you.
Having a clear conscious, so when they speak against you, as if you were evildoers, those who falsely accuse you may be ashamed by your good, Christ-like behavior.
For it is better, if it is the will of God, to suffer for doing what is right, then for doing what is evil.
Christ also suffered just one time concerning sins, the just on the behalf of the unjust, that he might bring us to God, even put to death in the flesh but made alive in the Spirit,
in which he also went and preached to the spirits in prison.
They were disobedient back when the long suffering of God waited in Noah's time while the ark was being prepared into which a few, eight souls in all, were saved through water.
This represents baptism, which now saves you--not by removing the filthiness of the flesh, but the answer of a clear conscience toward God--through the resurrection of Jesus Christ,
who has gone into heaven and is on the right hand of God. Angels, rulers, and powers being forced to submit to him.
